column2: "Na Josefmba kyɛfa no ɔdze pue fi Jeriko Jordan
column3: wɔ Jeriko nsu ho wɔ boka afamu
column4: mekyerɛ sar no a ɔdze fi Jeriko fow kodua nkokodo nkurow no mu kɔ Bɛtɛl no;"

column2: "na ɔdze pue fi Bɛtɛl kɔ Luz
column3: na otwa mu kɔ Arkifo he do wɔ Atarot;"

column2: "na osian anee afamu kɔ Jaflɛtefo he do
column3: dze kodu anaafo Bɛt-horon he do
column4: mekyerɛ ɔdze kodu Gezer: na n’edzifir wɔ po no ho."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee no nye yi: mekyerɛ hɔn egyapadze ne he wɔ boka afamu nye Atarot-addar

column2: "na ɔhe no dze pue anee afamu wɔ Mikemetat wɔ kwaamu afamu; na ɔhe no dze dan fa boka afamu kɔ Tanaat-siloh
column3: na otwa mu wɔ ho wɔ Janoa no boka afamu;"

column2: "Ɔhe no fi Tappua nam anee afamu dze kɔ Kana ɔwora no ho; na n’edzifir wɔ po no ho. Iyi nye Efraimmba ebusuakuw egyapadze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee;"

column2: "dze ka nkurow a woyiyii maa Efraimmba no wɔ Manaasɛmba egyapadze mu no ho
column3: nkurow no nyinara nye no nkuraase."

column2: "Naaso woenntu Keenanfo a wɔtse Gezer no: mbom Keenanfo no tsenaa Efraim finimfin dze bodu ndɛ da yi
column3: na Efraimfo no hyɛɛ hɔn ma wɔyɛɛ ɔsom edwuma."
